trans-unit.source: Represents an immutable (read-only) pair of "Name" and "Description" strings.

<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair> is a basic building block for structures that express locale specific information for an <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair"></xref> class.
The value for the locale <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name"></xref> property.
The value for the locale <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description"></xref> property.
Either the name parameter or description parameter is `null`.

The <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description%2A> property is set as a parameter to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description"></xref> properties of a given object match those of this <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair"></xref>.

The object to compare the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description"></xref> properties of.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description"></xref> properties of the given object match those of this instance; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a computed hash code based on the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description"></xref> properties.

A computed hash code based on the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description"></xref> properties of this <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name%2A> property is set as a parameter to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
